Bones of the Earth.name: Bones of the Earth
Bones of the Earth.flavor: Jagged rocks burst forth in answer to your attack and close on your enemy, crushing it in a stony embrace.
Bones of the Earth.onHit: 2[W] + 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes 10 damage whenever it moves on its turn (save ends).
Bones of the Earth.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes 5 damage whenever it moves on its turn (save ends).

Encaging Spirits.name: Encaging Spirits
Encaging Spirits.flavor: You call on protecting spirits to harry your foes.
Encaging Spirits.effect: You push each target 1 square, and each target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Inevitable Shot.name: Inevitable Shot
Inevitable Shot.flavor: Even as your target ducks under your shot, the projectile moves on its own to find another enemy.
Inevitable Shot.trigger: You miss a creature with a ranged attack
Inevitable Shot.effect: You make a ranged basic attack against an enemy within 5 squares of the creature you missed, using that creature’s space as the attack’s origin square.
Inevitable Shot.special: You regain the use of this power when you spend an action point.

Elemental Spirits.name: Elemental Spirits
Elemental Spirits.flavor: Whether taking the form of blazing flame, crackling ice, sizzling lightning, or thunderous storm, elemental spirits shoot forth to do your enemy harm.
Elemental Spirits.special: Choose cold, fire, lightning, or thunder whenever you use this power. Your choice determines the power’s damage type.
Elemental Spirits.onHit:
1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage of the chosen type. Until the end of your next turn, any creature that starts its turn adjacent to the target takes damage of the chosen type equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage of the chosen type.

Biting Swarm.name: Biting Swarm
Biting Swarm.flavor: Stinging spirit insects swarm around your enemy.
Biting Swarm.onHit:
1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target and each enemy adjacent to it take a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.
Biting Swarm.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Thorn Cloud Shot.name: Thorn Cloud Shot
Thorn Cloud Shot.flavor: Thorn-covered vines sprout up from the ground around the enemy you strike.
Thorn Cloud Shot.onHit:
1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. The attack creates a zone in a burst 1 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the start of your next turn. Any creature that ends its turn within the zone takes poison damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.

Flickering Arrow.name: Flickering Arrow
Flickering Arrow.flavor: With a flash, primal motes of light illuminate your target and dazzle those nearby.
Flickering Arrow.onHit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target can’t benefit from cover, concealment, or total concealment, and enemies take a –2 penalty to attack rolls while within 2 squares of the target.
Flickering Arrow.bloodbond: Enemies take the penalty while within a number squares of the target equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier.

Spider Spirits.name: Spider Spirits
Spider Spirits.flavor: The spider spirit sends forth its children to harry your foes.
Spider Spirits.onHit: 1[W] + 1d8 + Wisdom modifier poison damage, and the target is slowed and takes a –2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Fungal Blooms.name: Fungal Blooms
Fungal Blooms.flavor: When your projectile strikes your foe, the air fills with spores that create quivering puffballs where they land.
Fungal Blooms.effect: You conjure four fungal blooms in four different squares adjacent to the primary target. A fungal bloom can use the Fungal Bloom Attack power, using the fungal bloom’s square as the origin square. Once a fungal bloom attacks, it disappears. It otherwise lasts until the end of the encounter.
Fungal Blooms.trigger: An enemy enters the fungal bloom’s square
Fungal Blooms.requirement: The Fungal Blooms power must be activated in order to use this power.

Storm of Spirit Shards.name: Storm of Spirit Shards
Storm of Spirit Shards.flavor: Your projectile becomes a burst of spirit shards, which rain down on your foes.

Hunter's Instinct.name: Hunter's Instinct
Hunter's Instinct.flavor: In the middle of battle, you know where to strike and make it hurt the most.
Hunter's Instinct.effect: Until the stance ends, when you make a ranged weapon attack against any creature within 2 squares of you, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.

Stag's Grace.name: Stag's Grace
Stag's Grace.flavor: With spirit-granted grace, you move and attack in a way that prevents your foe from taking advantage of your attention being elsewhere.
Stag's Grace.effect: Choose one enemy you can see. Until the end of your next turn, you do not provoke opportunity attacks from that enemy.

Escaping Shot.name: Escaping Shot
Escaping Shot.flavor: Brandishing your weapon, you call forth spirits to stupefy your enemy.
Escaping Shot.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Escaping Shot.bloodbond: The number of squares you shift equals your Dexterity modifier.
Escaping Shot.special: Making this attack doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack from the target.

Winter Spirit.name: Winter Spirit
Winter Spirit.flavor: Winter spirits swirl and dance in eddies of snow that appear where your attack falls.
Winter Spirit.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of its next turn.
Winter Spirit.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Corralling Shot.name: Corralling Shot
Corralling Shot.flavor: Your projectile divides midflight into three barbs, which thrust two foes toward a third.
Corralling Shot.secondaryTarget: One or two creatures that are within 5 squares of the primary target
Corralling Shot.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] damage, and you slide the secondary target 5 squares to a square adjacent to the primary target.

Ensnaring Shot.name: Ensnaring Shot
Ensnaring Shot.flavor: Just before your shot strikes your foe, the projectile explodes into tiny, burrowing seeds that grow into binding vines.
Ensnaring Shot.effect: The attack creates a zone of difficult terrain in a burst 1 centered on the primary target. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. Until the zone ends, you can use the Ensnaring Shot Attack power, using a square within the zone as the origin square.
Ensnaring Shot.trigger: An enemy enters the zone or starts its turn there
Ensnaring Shot.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Ensnaring Shot.requirement: The Ensnaring Shot power must be active in order to use this power.

Blurring Stride.name: Blurring Stride
Blurring Stride.flavor: When you move across the battlefield, you become less and less distinct.
Blurring Stride.effect: You assume a blurry form until the end of your next turn. Until this form ends, if you end a move action at least 3 squares from where you started, you gain concealment until the end of your next turn.

Earthbond Gift.name: Earthbond Gift
Earthbond Gift.flavor: When at your weakest, you draw renewing strength from the land.
Earthbond Gift.requirement: You must be bloodied or weakened.
Earthbond Gift.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to twice your Wisdom modifier. If you are weakened, you can also make a saving throw against as single effect on you that is weakening you.

Thunder Spirit.name: Thunder Spirit
Thunder Spirit.flavor: A distant rumble sounds, portending what will happen when your missile finds its mark.
Thunder Spirit.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and the target falls prone and is deafened until the end of your next turn.
Thunder Spirit.bloodbond: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes thunder damage equal to your Dexterity modifier and is deafened until the end of your next turn.

Wasp Sting Shot.name: Wasp Sting Shot
Wasp Sting Shot.flavor: Vicious wasps fill the air around your enemy, adding their stingers to your weapon’s bite.
Wasp Sting Shot.onHit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier poison damage. The attack creates a zone in a burst 1 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes poison damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.
Wasp Sting Shot.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Binding Shot.name: Binding Shot
Binding Shot.flavor: Two shots leap toward your foes, and when the shots strike, tendrils spread out to bind the foes together.
Binding Shot.target: Two creatures within 5 squares of each other
Binding Shot.effect: If both attacks hit, you slide one of the targets 5 squares to a square adjacent to the other target, and each target is bound by vines (save ends). Until this effect ends on a target, that target can’t move by any means to a square that isn’t adjacent to the other target. When a target makes a saving throw against this effect, the target can take 10 damage to gain a +5 bonus to the saving throw.

Squall Spirit.name: Squall Spirit
Squall Spirit.flavor: Spawned from raging spring storms, the squall spirits strike your foes with primal fury.
Squall Spirit.onHit: 1[W] + 2d8 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 thunder damage.

Host of Sparrows.name: Host of Sparrows
Host of Sparrows.flavor: As you are hurt, you dissipate into a host of sparrows, flying to re-form farther away.
Host of Sparrows.trigger: You are damaged by an attack
Host of Sparrows.effect: You assume the form of a cloud of flying sparrows until the start of your next turn, and you fly your speed without provoking opportunity attacks. While in this form, you are insubstantial, you can’t attack, and you can’t pick up or manipulate objects. If you are still airborne at the start of your turn, you land without taking falling damage.

Sheltering Underbrush.name: Sheltering Underbrush
Sheltering Underbrush.flavor: Vines and undergrowth burst forth to shelter you.
Sheltering Underbrush.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. You and your allies have cover while within the zone, and the zone is difficult terrain for your enemies.

Raven Wing Shot.name: Raven Wing Shot
Raven Wing Shot.flavor: Avian shadows swirl and flutter about your prey, their talons leaving bloody rents.
Raven Wing Shot.onHit: 1[W] + 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. If the target doesn’t end its next turn at least 2 squares away from its starting position, it takes 1d8 damage.
Raven Wing Shot.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Swarming Spirits.name: Swarming Spirits
Swarming Spirits.flavor: Angry bees follow your missile, swarming around your enemy until it cannot see and pestering other enemies nearby.
Swarming Spirits.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is blinded, and enemies take a –2 penalty to attack rolls while within 2 squares of the target.
Swarming Spirits.bloodbond: Enemies take the penalty while within a number squares of the target equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier.

Corrosive Slime.name: Corrosive Slime
Corrosive Slime.flavor: Your missile slams into the foe, causing its skin to bubble. Corrosive ropes of slime then burst from it and burn your other enemies.
Corrosive Slime.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier acid damage, and the target and each enemy adjacent to it take ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Corrosive Slime.onMiss: Half damage, and each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 acid damage.
Corrosive Slime.effect: Any creature reduced to 0 hit points by this power dissolves into a puddle of corrosive slime that fills the creature’s space. Until the end of the encounter, any creature that enters that space or starts its turn there takes 5 acid damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Wave of Sleep.name: Wave of Sleep
Wave of Sleep.flavor: Your projectile dissolves into a blast of sand that lodges in your opponents’ eyes, causing unendurable fatigue.
Wave of Sleep.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is unconscious instead of dazed (save ends).

Bramble Hide.name: Bramble Hide
Bramble Hide.flavor: Thorny vines emerge from your skin, promising pain to any who try to harm you.
Bramble Hide.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 bonus to AC, and any creature that hits you with a melee attack takes 10 + your Wisdom modifier damage.

Sure Sight.name: Sure Sight
Sure Sight.flavor: Your missiles shine with emerald light, and no earthly force can block your sight.
Sure Sight.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain darkvision, ignore concealment and total concealment, and are immune to the blinded condition.

Flesh-Tether Shot.name: Flesh-Tether Shot
Flesh-Tether Shot.flavor: The missile punches through your enemy, dragging some of its viscera with it as it slams into the ground. It can move, but it’s going to hurt.
Flesh-Tether Shot.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. If the target moves before the end of your next turn, it takes 5 damage and is dazed until the end of its next turn.
Flesh-Tether Shot.bloodbond: The target also grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Sprite Dance.name: Sprite Dance
Sprite Dance.flavor: Cunning sprites emerge from the Feywild to dance with your enemies and draw them into danger across the battlefield.
Sprite Dance.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you teleport the target 5 squares. One ally adjacent to the destination space can then make a melee basic attack against the target as an immediate reaction.

Fury Spirits.name: Fury Spirits
Fury Spirits.flavor: A well-placed shot calls forth primal spirits that carry your enemy’s pain to your other enemies.
Fury Spirits.effect: You conjure four avenging spirits in four different squares adjacent to the primary target. Each spirit can use the Fury Spirits Attack power, using the spirit’s square as the origin square. Once a spirit attacks, it disappears. It otherwise lasts until the end of the encounter.
Fury Spirits.requirement: The Fury Spirits power must be activated in order to use this power.
Fury Spirits.trigger: An enemy enters the spirit's square

Captivating Missile.name: Captivating Missile
Captivating Missile.flavor: When your missile strikes, blue and green light plays across your foe briefly as you establish control over its mind.
Captivating Missile.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is dominated (save ends).
Captivating Missile.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Nature's Passage.name: Nature's Passage
Nature's Passage.flavor: For a time, you walk partly in the world and partly in the realm of the spirits.
Nature's Passage.effect: Until the stance ends, you are phasing.

Guiding Spirit.name: Guiding Spirit
Guiding Spirit.flavor: Spirits guide your aim, helping you strike a distant foe.
Guiding Spirit.effect: You gain a +5 power bonus to the next ranged attack roll you make before the end of your turn.

Stride-Breaking Shot.name: Stride-Breaking Shot
Stride-Breaking Shot.flavor: You strike your foe in a sensitive spot, and if the foe retreats, the wound becomes more painful.
Stride-Breaking Shot.onHit: 1[W] + 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes 5 damage whenever it moves on its turn or uses an attack power.
Stride-Breaking Shot.bloodbond: Add your Dexterity modifier to the damage the target takes whenever it moves on its turn or uses an attack power.

Quill Storm.name: Quill Storm
Quill Storm.flavor: When your projectile hits your enemy, long quills tear from it and fly outward.
Quill Storm.onHit: 1[W] + 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Make a secondary attack that is an area burst 3 centered on the primary target.
Quill Storm.secondaryTarget: Each creature in the burst other than the primary target
Quill Storm.secondaryOnHit: 1d8 damage, and the secondary target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Wind of Decay.name: Wind of Decay
Wind of Decay.flavor: A fetid wind carries your missile into the heart of your foes and delivers a sickening stench.
Wind of Decay.onHit: 2[W] + 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target and each enemy adjacent to it are dazed (save ends).
Wind of Decay.effect: The attack creates a zone in a burst 1 centered on the target. The zone lasts until you dismiss it as a minor action or until the end of the encounter. Any creature that ends its turn within the zone takes 10 poison damage. As a move action, you can move the zone 4 squares.

Lightning Burst.name: Lightning Burst
Lightning Burst.flavor: At your command, tiny sparks grow into humanoid shapes formed from lightning that dance and scorch your enemies.
Lightning Burst.effect: Make a secondary attack for each primary target. Each attack is an area burst 1 centered on a different primary target.
Lightning Burst.secondaryTarget: Each creature in the burst other than the primary targets

Devouring Arrow.name: Devouring Arrow
Devouring Arrow.flavor: Your projectile rots as it flies toward your foe, until nothing but horrid maggots remain to feast on the foe.
Devouring Arrow.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier necrotic damage, and the target and each creature adjacent to it are weakened until the end of your next turn.
Devouring Arrow.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Razor Hail.name: Razor Hail
Razor Hail.flavor: Your projectile splinters into a cloud of razor-sharp icicles that rip flesh and then melt away in a crimson flood.
Razor Hail.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier cold damage. If the target moves more than half its speed on its next turn, it falls prone at the end of that turn.
Razor Hail.bloodbond: If the target moves at all on its next turn, it grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Baleful Shot.name: Baleful Shot
Baleful Shot.flavor: The foe you strike with your projectile warps and twists excruciatingly, the sight of which rattles your enemies.
Baleful Shot.onHit: 2[W] + 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Baleful Shot.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Baleful Shot.effect: Any enemy that can see the target and isn’t immune to fear takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

Uttercold.name: Uttercold
Uttercold.flavor: Heat flees the target of your attack, freezing the target solid.
Uttercold.onHit: 2[W] + 2d8 + Wisdom modifier cold damage, and the target is restrained and gains vulnerable 10 to all damage (save ends both). In addition, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the target takes 5 cold damage and is slowed until the start of its next turn.
Uttercold.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Spirits' Rebuke.name: Spirits' Rebuke
Spirits' Rebuke.flavor: You dodge your enemy’s attack, and spirits coalesce around you to punish your attacker.
Spirits' Rebuke.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon.
Spirits' Rebuke.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Spirits' Rebuke.effect: The target takes 1[W] + your Strength modifier damage, and you push it 1 square.

Grappling Spirits.name: Grappling Spirits
Grappling Spirits.flavor: Spirits erupt from your weapon, seizing your enemy and impeding its movement.
Grappling Spirits.onHit:
1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed and can’t shift until the end of its next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.
Grappling Spirits.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Guardian Harrier.name: Guardian Harrier
Guardian Harrier.flavor: A raptor spirit claws at your foe’s face until the foe retreats.
Guardian Harrier.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Guardian Harrier.onHit:
1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. If the target doesn’t end its next turn at least 2 squares away from its starting position, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage.
Guardian Harrier.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Mischief Spirits.name: Mischief Spirits
Mischief Spirits.flavor: Troublesome spirits shimmer around your foe, tripping it if it dares move.
Mischief Spirits.onHit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. If the target moves on its next turn, it falls prone at the end of that turn.
Mischief Spirits.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Possessing Spirits.name: Possessing Spirits
Possessing Spirits.flavor: From your foe’s wound, a possessing spirit takes hold, making the foe attack its companion.
Possessing Spirits.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against an enemy adjacent to it. If that attack hits, the target and that enemy are also dazed until the end of your next turn.

Serpent Arrow.name: Serpent Arrow
Serpent Arrow.flavor: Your projectile takes the form of a constrictor serpent. Where it strikes, it binds with menacing strength. When it releases, it scatters your foes.
Serpent Arrow.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Serpent Arrow.onHit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. At the end of the target’s next turn, you slide the target and each enemy adjacent to it 1 square.
Serpent Arrow.spiritbond: The number of squares you slide the enemies adjacent to the target equals your Strength modifier.

Rime Strike.name: Rime Strike
Rime Strike.flavor: You attack your enemy and call on primal spirits to rime the ground around it.
Rime Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Rime Strike.effect: The attack creates a zone of difficult terrain in a burst 1 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of the encounter. Any creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 5 cold damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. As a minor action, you can end the zone.

Spirit Rider.name: Spirit Rider
Spirit Rider.flavor: A malformed spirit leaps from your weapon to latch onto your foe and then slash at nearby enemies when the foe’s attacks fail.
Spirit Rider.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Spirit Rider.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the first time the target misses with an attack each round, each enemy adjacent to the target takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Swarming Bats.name: Swarming Bats
Swarming Bats.flavor: Your attack brings with it a flutter of bat spirits that confuse your enemies.
Swarming Bats.effect: You slide each target 1 square. The burst creates a zone of difficult terrain that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is also difficult terrain for flying creatures. While within the zone, enemies grant combat advantage. As a move action, you can move the zone 4 squares.

Harrying Spirits.name: Harrying Spirits
Harrying Spirits.flavor: When your enemy shrugs off an ill effect, you call spirits from the remnants of that effect to distract a different foe.
Harrying Spirits.trigger: An enemy you can see saves against an effect that a save can end
Harrying Spirits.target: One enemy in the burst other than the triggering enemy
Harrying Spirits.effect: Whenever the target attacks you before the end of the encounter, the target grants combat advantage until the end of its next turn.

Stone Spirit Ward.name: Stone Spirit Ward
Stone Spirit Ward.flavor: You become as resilient as stone, causing attacks to bounce off you with little effect.
Stone Spirit Ward.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain resistance to all damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Burrowing Shot.name: Burrowing Shot
Burrowing Shot.flavor: Beetles burrow into your enemy’s flesh, erupting to attack nearby foes when your target makes an aggressive action.
Burrowing Shot.onHit: 1[W] + 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. The first time the target makes an attack before the end of your next turn, each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 damage.

Spectral Scorpion Sting.name: Spectral Scorpion Sting
Spectral Scorpion Sting.flavor: Your attack calls forth a spirit scorpion to sting your enemies.
Spectral Scorpion Sting.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Spectral Scorpion Sting.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier poison damage. You conjure a spirit scorpion in an unoccupied square adjacent to the target. The scorpion lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to the scorpion takes 5 poison damage if it ends its turn not adjacent to the scorpion.

Stampede Shot.name: Stampede Shot
Stampede Shot.flavor: Spectral bison appear and follow your projectile as it streaks toward your enemy.
Stampede Shot.onHit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares, then push each enemy adjacent to it 2 squares.
Stampede Shot.spiritbond: The number of squares you push the target equals your Strength modifier.

Call of the Ghost Wolf.name: Call of the Ghost Wolf
Call of the Ghost Wolf.flavor: Your attack calls forth a wolf spirit to keep your foes at bay.
Call of the Ghost Wolf.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Call of the Ghost Wolf.effect: You conjure a ghost wolf in an unoccupied square adjacent to the target. The wolf occupies its square and lasts until the end of your next turn. Your allies can flank enemies with the wolf and deal 2d6 extra damage when they hit enemies flanked by it.
Call of the Ghost Wolf.sustainMinor: The wolf persists, and each enemy adjacent to it takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Protecting Spirits.name: Protecting Spirits
Protecting Spirits.flavor: With a flurry of spirit-guided attacks, you knock your foes away.
Protecting Spirits.onHit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
Protecting Spirits.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Wildfire Shot.name: Wildfire Shot
Wildfire Shot.flavor: Your enemy erupts in fire, which spreads to its allies.
Wildfire Shot.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends). Whenever the target takes this ongoing damage, each enemy adjacent to the target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Wildfire Shot.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

Cloak of Quills.name: Cloak of Quills
Cloak of Quills.flavor: Sharp spines emerge from your skin, making your enemies think twice about striking you.
Cloak of Quills.effect: Until the end of your next turn, whenever an adjacent enemy hits you with an opportunity attack, that enemy takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Eagle's Aim.name: Eagle's Aim
Eagle's Aim.flavor: Your eyesight sharpens until you can pick out the most distant foes.
Eagle's Aim.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you take no penalty to attack rolls for attacking at long range.

Feyjump Shot.name: Feyjump Shot
Feyjump Shot.flavor: Your missiles shine with emerald light and carry with them the Feywild’s power to relocate your foe.
Feyjump Shot.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you teleport the target 3 squares.
Feyjump Shot.effect: If you hit both targets, you can swap their positions when you teleport them, rather than teleporting each one 3 squares. If you do so, both targets are dazed until the end of your next turn.

Tremor Shot.name: Tremor Shot
Tremor Shot.flavor: When your shot strikes your foe, the ground trembles around it.
Tremor Shot.onHit: 1[W] + 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. Make a secondary attack that is an area burst 1 centered on the primary target.
Tremor Shot.secondaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst other than the primary target
Tremor Shot.secondaryOnHit: You slide the secondary target 1 square, and it grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Windstorm Strike.name: Windstorm Strike
Windstorm Strike.flavor: The winds pick up with sudden force, knocking your enemies away.
Windstorm Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Windstorm Strike.spiritbond: The number of squares you push the target equals your Strength modifier.

Nature's Vengeance.name: Nature's Vengeance
Nature's Vengeance.flavor: When you attack, nature responds with vines that ensnare your enemies.
Nature's Vengeance.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Nature's Vengeance.onHit: 1[W] + 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. You slide the target 1 square, and it is immobilized (save ends).
Nature's Vengeance.effect: The attack creates a zone in a burst 1 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. Whenever an enemy within the zone deals damage with an attack, that enemy is immobilized (save ends). If that enemy is already immobilized, it takes 5 damage, and it is restrained instead of immobilized (save ends).

Spirits of Fire and Ice.name: Spirits of Fire and Ice
Spirits of Fire and Ice.flavor: Flames and frost mingle their power to destroy your enemies.
Spirits of Fire and Ice.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier fire damage. Choose either the target or one creature adjacent to it. The creature you choose takes ongoing 5 cold damage and is immobilized (save ends both). Whenever that creature takes this ongoing damage, each enemy adjacent to it takes 5 cold damage.
Spirits of Fire and Ice.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 cold damage (save ends).

Burrowing Stride.name: Burrowing Stride
Burrowing Stride.flavor: You dive into the earth and reappear some distance from your starting point.
Burrowing Stride.effect: Until the stance ends, you can use a move action to move either your speed through loose earth or half your speed through solid stone. You must end the move in an unoccupied space.

Feywild Jaunt.name: Feywild Jaunt
Feywild Jaunt.flavor: You vanish into the Feywild. A moment later, you reappear some distance away from where you disappeared.
Feywild Jaunt.effect: You are removed from play. At the start of your next turn, you reappear in an unoccupied space of your choice. That space must be within a number of squares of the space you left equal to your speed.

Feymire Trap.name: Feymire Trap
Feymire Trap.flavor: Your attack causes your enemy to fall through a fold in space and appear elsewhere, hindered by primal spirits.
Feymire Trap.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Feymire Trap.onHit: 1[W] + 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. You teleport the target 3 squares, and it is slowed until the end of its next turn.

Rabid Shot.name: Rabid Shot
Rabid Shot.flavor: Your attack poisons your foe, causing it to throw itself at its ally.
Rabid Shot.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier poison damage. The target must use a free action to charge a creature of your choice. If the charge attack misses or the target can’t charge anyone, the target takes 10 poison damage.

Wind Spirits.name: Wind Spirits
Wind Spirits.flavor: The wind whips around you and shrieks when you make your attack.
Wind Spirits.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
Wind Spirits.spiritbond: The number of squares you push the target equals your Strength modifier.
Wind Spirits.special: Using this power doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Fey Sinkhole.name: Fey Sinkhole
Fey Sinkhole.flavor: You open a temporary rift to the Feywild. A vortex of beguiling magic lashes around the opening, dragging creatures toward it.
Fey Sinkhole.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter or until you dismiss it as a minor action. Until the zone ends, you can use the Fey Sinkhole Attack power, using a square within the zone as the origin square.
Fey Sinkhole.requirement: The power Fey Sinkhole must be active in order to use this power.
Fey Sinkhole.trigger: A creature starts its turn within the zone
Fey Sinkhole.target: The triggering creature in the burst
Fey Sinkhole.onHit: 5 psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the start of its next turn. If the target leaves the zone before the end of its turn, you can use a free action to teleport the target to a square within the zone.

Triple Raptor Shot.name: Triple Raptor Shot
Triple Raptor Shot.flavor: Your attack explodes into spirit raptors, which tear at your foe.
Triple Raptor Shot.attack: Wisdom vs. Reflex. Make the attack three times.

Earthfriend.name: Earthfriend
Earthfriend.flavor: The land welcomes you and your allies as old friends, allowing you easy passage.
Earthfriend.target: You and each ally in the burst
Earthfriend.effect: Each target ignores difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

Ephemeral Wings.name: Ephemeral Wings
Ephemeral Wings.flavor: When you’re struck, ephemeral wings carry you to safety.
Ephemeral Wings.trigger: An enemy damages you with a melee or a close attack
Ephemeral Wings.effect: You fly a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier and must land in a square that is farther away from the enemy than where you started. This movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Convocation of Arrows.name: Convocation of Arrows
Convocation of Arrows.flavor: Screeching eagles join the fight, emerging from the spirit world to savage your foes.
Convocation of Arrows.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Infestation of Moths.name: Infestation of Moths
Infestation of Moths.flavor: Your enemy collapses into a fluttering cloud of moths, which blind nearby enemies.
Infestation of Moths.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Infestation of Moths.onHit: 1[W] + 2d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares. Until the start of your next turn, the target is insubstantial, and enemies are blinded while adjacent to it.
Infestation of Moths.spiritbond: The number of squares you slide the target equals 2 + your Strength modifier.

Conflagration Spirit.name: Conflagration Spirit
Conflagration Spirit.flavor: Your projectile ignites with blue flames, spilling liquid fire wherever it falls.
Conflagration Spirit.onHit: 1[W] + 2d8 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Conflagration Spirit.effect: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes 10 fire damage.

Grasping Vines.name: Grasping Vines
Grasping Vines.flavor: Your attack causes vines to twist around your foe. They don’t let go until it has felt pain.
Grasping Vines.onHit: 1[W] + 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage. The target is then immobilized until it has taken at least 10 damage.
Grasping Vines.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Rending Vines.name: Rending Vines
Rending Vines.flavor: Thorny vines erupt from the earth and snake around your enemies, tearing at them as they try to escape.
Rending Vines.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Rending Vines.onHit: 5 damage, and the secondary target is restrained (save ends).
Rending Vines.effect: The burst creates a zone of difficult terrain that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that starts its turn within the zone takes 5 damage. Until the zone ends, you can use the Rending Vines Attack power, using a square within the zone as the origin square.
Rending Vines.requirement: The power Rending Vines must be active in order to use this power.

Land Passage.name: Land Passage
Land Passage.flavor: The earth opens up and welcomes you and your friend into its primal embrace.
Land Passage.trigger: You are targeted by an attack
Land Passage.target: You or you and one ally
Land Passage.effect: The targets are removed from play. At the start of your next turn, they each reappear in unoccupied spaces within 5 squares of the space you left.

Primal Morass.name: Primal Morass
Primal Morass.flavor: Water bubbles up from the ground and creates a morass.
Primal Morass.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Each square within the zone requires 2 extra squares of movement to enter. Creatures ignore this effect while flying.

Roaring Missile.name: Roaring Missile
Roaring Missile.flavor: As you attack, your body vibrates with a deep rumble that transitions into a destructive roar from the spirit world and slams into your enemies.
Roaring Missile.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier thunder damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is deafened and dazed, and each enemy adjacent to it is deafened.

Sinking Earth.name: Sinking Earth
Sinking Earth.flavor: The ground turns to mud beneath your enemy’s feet, trapping it in a quagmire.
Sinking Earth.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is restrained, and enemies adjacent to it are slowed.
Sinking Earth.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Spirit Inferno.name: Spirit Inferno
Spirit Inferno.flavor: Sparks fly from your weapon as you hit your foe, which erupts in flames that grow worse when its allies attack.
Spirit Inferno.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Spirit Inferno.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is immobilized and takes 5 fire damage whenever an enemy within 5 squares of it makes an attack.
Spirit Inferno.spiritbond: Add your Strength modifier to the fire damage.

Slavering Sentinels.name: Slavering Sentinels
Slavering Sentinels.flavor: From the circle drawn with your weapon, slavering spirit beasts appear around you and shelter you from harm.
Slavering Sentinels.effect: You conjure four spirit sentinels in four different unoccupied squares in the burst. The sentinels occupy their squares, and they last until the end of your next turn. The sentinels grant cover to you and your allies. As a move action, you can move a single sentinel to a square within 10 squares of you. While the sentinels persist, you can use the Slavering Sentinels Attack power through them.
Slavering Sentinels.requirement: The power Slavering Sentinels must be active in order to use this power.
Slavering Sentinels.trigger: An enemy starts its turn adjacent to a sentinel
Slavering Sentinels.onHit: 3d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 5 squares from the sentinel.

Thundering Shot.name: Thundering Shot
Thundering Shot.flavor: An earsplitting crack sounds when you strike, sending thunder out in all directions.
Thundering Shot.effect: Make a secondary attack that is an area burst 1 centered on the primary target.
Thundering Shot.secondaryOnHit: 10 thunder damage, and the secondary target is dazed and slowed (save ends both).

Abundant Growth.name: Abundant Growth
Abundant Growth.flavor: Your missile takes root in the target, sprouting creeping vines that cause the target to stumble and fall.
Abundant Growth.onHit: 2[W] + 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the start of your next turn. The first time the target takes damage while slowed by this power, the target is instead immobilized until the end of your next turn. The first time the target takes damage while immobilized by this power, the target falls prone.

Angry Earth.name: Angry Earth
Angry Earth.flavor: Spirits of stone and soil rise in answer to your attack’s call and knock down your foes.
Angry Earth.onHit: 2[W] + 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target and all enemies within 2 squares of it fall prone.

Widows' Net.name: Widows' Net
Widows' Net.flavor: The wound your weapon inflicts gives birth to swarming black widows, causing your foe to fall back and ensnare its allies.
Widows' Net.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Widows' Net.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier poison damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. Each enemy adjacent to the target at the end of this movement is restrained until the end of your next turn.
Widows' Net.spiritbond: The number of squares you slide the target equals your Strength modifier.

Trampling Shot.name: Trampling Shot
Trampling Shot.flavor: At your call, spectral rhinos slam into your foes, and then you fire, taking advantage of the chaos unleashed by the stampede.
Trampling Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Trampling Shot.effect: You make a ranged basic attack with a +2 bonus to attack rolls for each target you hit with the close blast and a +5 bonus to damage rolls for each target you missed with it.

Steel Forest.name: Steel Forest
Steel Forest.flavor: The arrows you loose in quick succession fall among your enemies. If they strike the earth, the ground sprouts jagged barbs.
Steel Forest.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Steel Forest.effect: Each unoccupied square in the burst fills with jagged barbs until the start of your next turn. These squares are difficult terrain, and a creature that enters one of these squares without shifting takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Persistent Arrow.name: Persistent Arrow
Persistent Arrow.flavor: After punching through your target, the missile halts in the air, frozen until you command it to fly once more.

bonusPower.name: Persistent Arrow Attack
bonusPower.requirement: The power Persistent Arrow must be active in order to use this power.
bonusPower.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] damage, and you knock the target prone.

Persistent Arrow.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Persistent Arrow.effect: You conjure a persistent arrow in one unoccupied square adjacent to the target. The arrow remains until the end of the encounter or until expended. Any creature that enters a persistent arrow’s square takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (a creature can take this damage only once per turn). You can expend the arrow by using the Persistent Arrow Attack power using the persistent arrow’s square as the origin square for the attack.

Warding Arrow.name: Warding Arrow
Warding Arrow.flavor: Your fired arrow speeds back to intercept your enemy’s attack.
Warding Arrow.requirement: You must be wielding a bow
Warding Arrow.trigger: You would be hit by a melee attack
Warding Arrow.effect: You gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn. If the triggering attack still hit you, the triggering attacker grants combat advantage to you until the start of your next turn.

Seeker's Due.name: Seeker's Due
Seeker's Due.flavor: You draw and fire, exulting in your attack’s simplicity.
Seeker's Due.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Seeker's Due.bloodbond: This attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Seeker's Due.spiritbond: The target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn.
Seeker's Due.onMiss: You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls using ranged basic attacks until the end of your next turn.

Cursed Dart.name: Cursed Dart
Cursed Dart.flavor: You whisper a terrible curse as you nock the arrow. When you release it, you speed death and despair to your enemy.
Cursed Dart.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Cursed Dart.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage plus 1d10 psychic damage.
Cursed Dart.effect: The attack creates a zone in a burst 1 centered on the target (save ends). The zone moves with the target. Any enemy other than the target that starts its turn within the zone takes 5 psychic damage and becomes immobilized until the start of its next turn.

Swirling Arrows.name: Swirling Arrows
Swirling Arrows.flavor: Although the shot goes wide, the spirit lurking in the arrow refuses to surrender and flies off again to find a target.
Swirling Arrows.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Swirling Arrows.trigger: You miss with the ranged basic attack granted by inevitable shot.
Swirling Arrows.effect: You regain inevitable shot and you use it immediately.

Far Step Arrow.name: Far Step Arrow
Far Step Arrow.flavor: Your enemy’s blood marks your path, letting you bridge the distance with primal power.
Far Step Arrow.trigger: You drop a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points with an attack
Far Step Arrow.effect: You teleport to an unoccupied square adjacent to the triggering enemy.

Cordon of Thorns.name: Cordon of Thorns
Cordon of Thorns.flavor: The arrow you loosed explodes into tiny thorns that hang suspended around your enemies, promising pain to any who dares pass through them.
Cordon of Thorns.requirement: The power Cordon of Thorns must be active in order to use this power.
Cordon of Thorns.effect: The three squares of the burst which are farthest from you become a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. While the zone remains, you can use the Cordon of Thorns Attack power.
Cordon of Thorns.secondaryOnHit: 1d6 damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

Arrows of Misfortune.name: Arrows of Misfortune
Arrows of Misfortune.flavor: Your projectiles blacken in midflight, assuming a sinister cast that hints at the doom awaiting those struck by them.

bonusPower.name: Arrows of Misfortune Attack
bonusPower.requirement: The power Arrows of Misfortune must be active in order to use this power.
bonusPower.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses and attack rolls (save ends).

Arrows of Misfortune.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Arrows of Misfortune.effect: You conjure an arrow of misfortune in an unoccupied square adjacent to each target. Each arrow remains until the end of the encounter or until expended. Any creature that enters an arrow of misfortune’s square takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier and you slide the creature 1 square (a creature can take this damage only once per turn). You can expend an arrow of misfortune by using the Arrows of Misfortune Attack power using the arrow of misfortune’s square as the origin square for the attack.

Seeker's Peerless Shot.name: Seeker's Peerless Shot
Seeker's Peerless Shot.flavor: You send two missiles at the enemy, confident in the spirit’s power to guide them true.
Seeker's Peerless Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Seeker's Peerless Shot.bloodbond: This attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Seeker's Peerless Shot.spiritbond: The target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn.
Seeker's Peerless Shot.onMiss: Make a ranged basic attack against any enemy within 5 squares of the creature you missed, using any square in the missed creature’s space for the attack’s origin square.

Black Arrow of Fate.name: Black Arrow of Fate
Black Arrow of Fate.flavor: You draw a special arrow, inscribed with bitter oaths, and launch it at your prey. Where it falls, anguish follows.
Black Arrow of Fate.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Black Arrow of Fate.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage plus 1d10 psychic damage.
Black Arrow of Fate.effect: The attack creates a zone in a burst 2 centered on the target’s space (save ends). The zone moves with the target, remaining centered on its space. Any enemy other than the target that starts its turn within the zone takes 5 psychic damage and is dazed until the start of its next turn.

Seeking Arrow.name: Seeking Arrow
Seeking Arrow.flavor: You whisper to the spirit housed in your arrow, calling it to seek out and destroy your foe.
Seeking Arrow.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Seeking Arrow.effect: You enter the seeking arrow stance. Until this stance ends, you regain the use of inevitable shot at the start of each of your turns.

Biting Wind Arrows.name: Biting Wind Arrows
Biting Wind Arrows.flavor: One after another, your arrows fly toward your targets, but hit or miss, the arrows remain awaiting your command to strike again.
Biting Wind Arrows.requirement: The power Biting Wind Arrows must be active in order to use this power.
Biting Wind Arrows.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, you knock the target prone, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses and attack rolls (save ends).
Biting Wind Arrows.effect: You conjure a biting wind arrow in an unoccupied square adjacent to each target. Each arrow remains until the end of the encounter or until expended. Any creature that enters a biting wind arrow’s square takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier and you slide the creature 1 square. You can expend an arrow by using the Biting Wind Attack power using the biting wind arrow as the origin square for the attack.

Short Shot Onslaught.name: Short Shot Onslaught
Short Shot Onslaught.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Short Shot Onslaught.flavor: Your time spent underground has forced you to adapt to skirmishing in close quarters.
Short Shot Onslaught.target: One, two, or three creatures in the burst
Short Shot Onslaught.effect: After all of this power’s attacks are resolved, you can use a free action to shift up to 2 squares for each attack that hit. You ignore difficult terrain during this movement.

Tidal Spirit Shot.name: Tidal Spirit Shot
Tidal Spirit Shot.flavor: Spirits of the lunar tides tug at your prey.
Tidal Spirit Shot.onHit:
1[W] damage, and you can slide the target 1 square.
Level 21: 2[W] modifier damage.

Into the Black Bog.name: Into the Black Bog
Into the Black Bog.flavor: You momentarily cast your enemy through a dark swamp in the Feywild. The foe returns covered in a thick mud, which blunts its attacks.
Into the Black Bog.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, you can teleport the target 1 square, and the target takes a penalty to damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.

Spider Thicket.name: Spider Thicket
Spider Thicket.flavor: You hurl your foes through a thicket of webs in the Feywild. They return covered in translucent venomous spiders, which gnaw at their flesh.
Spider Thicket.onHit: The target is weakened and takes ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends both).
Spider Thicket.effect: You teleport the target to a square in the burst.

Bonds of Moonlight.name: Bonds of Moonlight
Bonds of Moonlight.flavor: You bind your foes in strands of silver moonlight.
Bonds of Moonlight.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown weapon or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Bonds of Moonlight.onHit: 1[W] + 1d8 + Wisdom modifier cold and radiant damage, and the target is restrained (save ends).

Spectral Forest.name: Spectral Forest
Spectral Forest.flavor: Your shot conjures a ghostly copse that harries and hinders your foes while protecting you and your allies.
Spectral Forest.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies, and any enemy that enters the zone or ends its turn there takes 15 psychic damage (an enemy can take this damage only once per turn). You and your allies have partial cover while in the zone.

Wisp Shot.name: Wisp Shot
Wisp Shot.flavor: Your attack changes an enemy into an irksome will-o’-wisp.
Wisp Shot.onHit: 1[W] + 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target assumes the form of a Tiny wisp of light (save ends). In this form, the target gains a fly speed of 6 (hover) and is dazed, and it cannot use standard or minor actions. All of the target’s equipment transforms with it.
Wisp Shot.effect: Any enemy within 5 squares of the target when you make the attack cannot teleport or use immediate actions until the end of your next turn.

Fading Grotto.name: Fading Grotto
Fading Grotto.flavor: You open the way to a starlit grotto into which you dispatch one opponent after another.
Fading Grotto.onHit: The secondary target is removed from play until the end of your next turn.
Fading Grotto.effect: The attack creates a zone of difficult terrain in a burst 2 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn. Enemies in the zone grant combat advantage.
Fading Grotto.sustainMinor: The zone persists until the end of your next turn, and you make the secondary attack.
Fading Grotto.requirement: The Fading Grotto power must be active in order to use this attack.
Fading Grotto.secondaryTarget: One enemy in the zone that has not been targeted by this secondary attack

Fey Commander's Lure.name: Fey Commander's Lure
Fey Commander's Lure.flavor: Your attack not only teleports your enemies but also leaves them visibly shaken.
Fey Commander's Lure.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and you can teleport the target to a square within 3 squares of you. In addition, the target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Fey Commander's Lure.effect: Until the end of your next turn, when you hit an enemy with a ranged attack, you can teleport it to a square within 3 squares of you as a free action right after the attack. In addition, the target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
